title: Police arrest Florida man who allegedly threatened to kill Trump
shortDescription: A man in West Palm Beach, Florida has been arrested after being accused of making threats against President Trump, police say.

title: Trump's boundary-testing first week shows aggressive use of power
shortDescription: Trump pardoned Jan. 6 rioters and tried to overturn birthright citizenship in an aggressive first week that included deportations and firings.

title: Trump invited to give first address to Congress since inauguration
shortDescription: Speaker Mike Johnson to make his first address to a joint session of Congress of his second term on Tuesday, March 4

title: Inside Congress' first days of the new Donald Trump administration
shortDescription: Unlike eight years ago, Congress isn't shocked by the tumult of a Trump White House.

title: Trump fires independent inspectors general at 17 federal agencies
shortDescription: The law requires the White House to give Congress at least 30 days notice.

title: Trump's first call was with Saudi leader. Why watchdogs are concerned
shortDescription: Trump has had a close relationship with the crown prince, Mohammed Bin Salman, even as his real estate company does major deals with oil-rich kingdom.

title: 'Overhauling FEMA': Takeaways from Trump's trips to US disaster zones
shortDescription: Trump visited areas impacted by flooding in North Carolina and fires in California. He suggested abolishing FEMA and putting conditions on fire aid.

title: Trump Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth confirmed by Senate
shortDescription: The Senate confirmed Pete Hegseth as secretary of Defense by a narrow margin on Friday night.

title: RFK Jr. lauds Trump’s order declassifying info on father's killing
shortDescription: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. praised President Donald Trump’s move to declassify files on his dad, uncle and Martin Luther King Jr.'s killings.

title: Trump, Newsom meet and tour fire damage
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was greeted by Gov. Gavin Newsom in Los Angeles to tour areas hit by the deadly wildfires.

title: Trump team asks Supreme Court to pause EPA and student debt cases
shortDescription: Justice officials have not said if they will change position on cases that have been argued but not decided, including one on gender-affirming care.

title: President Trump cancels Dr. Fauci security detail
shortDescription: "You can't have them forever." President Trump announced the federal security detail for Dr. Anthony Fauci has been cancelled.

title: Elon Musk's DOGE: Ditching the penny could save taxpayers billions
shortDescription: A penny-pinching tactic proposed by Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency could be getting rid of the penny itself.

title: Several of President Donald Trump's Cabinet nominees and other VIPs leave inauguration
shortDescription: Kash Patel, Howard Lutnick, David Sacks, Michael Whatley and others leave the Capitol.

title: President Trump says he wants FEMA gone
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he wants to do away with FEMA at a visit in Asheville, North Carolina which was hit hard by Hurricane Helene.

title: Judge orders Jan. 6 convict to avoid Capitol; DOJ fights back
shortDescription: The Justice Department told a judge he can't block Oath Keepers founder Stewart Rhodes from visiting the Capitol after Donald Trump's Jan. 6 clemency.

title: NC flood victims of Helene describe disaster to President Trump
shortDescription: North Carolina residents described harrowing escapes from rising floodwaters from Hurricane Helene as Trump surveyed the disaster and recovery.

title: Who is Pete Hegseth, Trump's pick for defense secretary?
shortDescription: Among President-elect Donald Trump's nominees for top positions in his administration, Pete Hegseth is one of the most controversial to face Senate confirmation hearings.

title: Trump deputizes thousands of agents to arrest immigrants | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: A judge blocked Trump's birthright citizenship order. | Trump orders a crypto working group to draft new regulations. | It's all on The Excerpt.

title: Trump administration removes FDA plan to ban menthol cigarettes
shortDescription: The Trump administrations removed FDA's plan to ban menthol cigarettes. The Biden administration did not finalize the rule amid opposition.
